How I live

Notes on my lifestyle and principles I apply.

Nutrition

Not long since adopting a vegan diet, I noticed much more sustained levels of energy and increased lean body mass. Thus, I have aligned my food intake with nature, only eating as much as suffices my body for good health, and consuming everything from fresh produce. The decision regarding transitioning into a vegan diet has to do mainly with morality insights after watching Dominion and the desire to avoid harmful actions.
